sentence: Former presidential candidate Marianne Williamson endorsed Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson in Wisconsin's Democratic Senate primary on Monday, calling Nelson "the candidate with the truest progressive vision."
author: Julia Manchester
title: Marianne Williamson endorses Tom Nelson in Wisconsin Senate race

sentence: Mandela Barnes' new internal from Impact Research (formerly known as Anzalone Liszt Grove or ALG) gives him a 38-17 lead over Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry in the August Democratic primary, with state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson at 9% and 8%, respectively.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 3/29

sentence: In many ways, Barnes, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson and state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski are following the political path Baldwin blazed.
author: Bill Glauber
title: Democratic U.S. Senate contenders in Wisconsin focus on manufacturing
